oracion: María: Ok, Fogtag, your next! I’m going to teach you about celebrations.

Fogtag: What is a celebration?
María: A celebration is an event where people get together to have fun and give gifts.

María: Today is your birthday, Fogtag, so I baked you a cake!
Fogtag: Thank you! Do you eat cake on your birthday?
María: Yes, I do!

María: I also got you this gift!
Fogtag: I love it! Thank you, María!
María: You’re welcome, Fogtag.
Fogtag: What do you want for your birthday, María?
María: Well, I always need more tools in my workshop.

Fogtag: When is your birthday?
María: My birthday is in December. There is a big celebration in December, too. It’s called Christmas.

Fogtag: What is Christmas? Do you eat cake on Christmas?
María:
No, no. Christmas is a time when friends and families get together to decorate a tree, give presents, and eat good food.

Fogtag: Wow! I want to see more celebrations.
María:
I know, Fogtag. There are so many for you to see!
